title: Decorative armour (red plateskirt)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Red decorative skirt can be bought in the Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 6 castle wars tickets. They can only be bought from Lanthus. The red decorative skirt and their legs counterpart offer the same stats as steel platelegs and do not have the normally reduced weight of plateskirts, making the steel plateskirt more effective. It requires level 5 Defence to wear.

The Red decorative skirt can be bought in the Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 6 castle wars tickets. They can only be bought from Lanthus. The red decorative skirt and their legs counterpart offer the same stats as steel platelegs and do not have the normally reduced weight of plateskirts, making the steel plateskirt more effective. It requires level 5 Defence to wear.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Castle Wars armour (1) set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

[[File:Decorative armour (red plateskirt) detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''Red decorative skirt''' can be bought in the [[Castle Wars]] area south of the [[Observatory]] for 6 [[castle wars ticket]]s. They can only be bought from [[Lanthus]]. The red decorative skirt and their [[Red decorative legs|legs]] counterpart offer the same stats as [[steel platelegs]] and do not have the normally reduced weight of plateskirts, making the [[steel plateskirt]] more effective. It requires level 5 [[Defence]] to wear.
